message: I'm liking it too. I even see a KRL module for convore in my future. :)
In place of a desktop client on OSX, I created a Fluid app, and it's working pretty well.
I love the threaded nature. Makes it easy to maintain context about a topic.
I'm liking it a lot as well. this is way better than yammer
Boom! You should really vote up this answer: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/5643819/developing-internet-explorer-extensions/5740004#5740004
Thanks for the prompt Alex, I voted the answer up!
Convore just added the ability to 'mute' topics and groups. Just one more reason why I'm really digging Convore.
